reviews.sentence: comfortable and well located. great hotel comfortable and well located its walk away from the bazaar and the old citythe sunday flea market is a must go for all antiques lovers and ones who love historythe staff is gentle and very helpful. the hotel has a great restaurant but advise is to go and have food at many close by restaurants and taste the local food.
Good. Location staff behaviour.

Great location Beautiful Hotel Would stay again without question. My girlfriend and I stayed at this hotel when I visited Warsaw for a second time and it did not disappoint. We stayed on the club floor and had a big beautiful. We had access to the club lounge that had free alcohol there was also breakfast in the morning that was free of charge on the club floor and snacks in the afternoon and evening if you were looking for a something quick. The hotel was in a great location as well with many restaurants close by and shopping. The staff at the hotel were very helpful which made the stay even more memorable. I would stay at this Sheraton again without thinking twice.

Best spot and close to many things. I travelled to three companies during my one week European trip. This hotel was fantastic and I do highly recommend it. Everything is modern and updated however till has the charm of an older hotel look. Good size room they cleaned the rooms twice at the club level sixth floor Great club launch service and verity of food refreshments and beverages Very good and right in the middle Hotel lobby bars closed early. After all for August as European vacation time they should stay open longer.
Exceptional. Rooms a very good size and very clean Very helpful staff.
地点尚算方便 一切不錯，地点方便，gym room is good staff are nice and helpful 惟浴缸去水欠佳.
This is a great hotel we were very impressed by the service.
great location great value great service great food. the variety was wonderful good coffee good bread meats cheseno wifi in the room only in the lobby and no money exchange at the front desk.

Specious and friendly. Everything you can expect from a city hotel. Just off the noisy center but with plenty to do just around it. Staff very helpful and friendly. Big clean and comfortable rooms. Breakfast and car service a little overpriced as compared to what you get just around the corner but other than that definitely recommend.

I Saw Warsaw. Very nice hotel in the heart of Warsaw. We arrived in the morning but they worked to get us a room quickly. The room was very large even with a desk and chaise lounge. There was a 60 TV on the wall. Bathroom was medium size and had nice tile work. There was even a scale measured in kilos. Look for the crystal chandelier as you enter.

Okay. The location is good some of them colleagues are very kind but the most of them are not as good as other 5 stars hotels probably it ’s the worst Sheron even though the worst spg group ’s hotel I experienced a reception lady is not nicely to their customer.

Best location and service. We stuef couple times since last December and we loved to stay every singel our stay at Sheraton Warsaw. Besides best location very clean rooms and best service. Receptions were very kind and professional friendly. Also business floor lounge service were awazing. Definitely recommend thid hotel.

Sheraton Warsaw. Stunning hotel inside and out. Wonderful location close to all the major sights as well as restaurants bars and shops. Excellent value for a hotel of this quality. Very comfortable and clean room and a generous amount of nice toiletries provided. Most of the staff were very friendly and helpful. The food at the SomePlace Else restaurant left more to be desired and more vegetarian options would be nice. Wifi could have been a bit stronger and sometimes cut out. Some of the staff were not the friendliest which was surprising for a 5star hotel.

Great hotel centrally located. we have just got back from staying 3 nights at this hotel and loved it. The check in was swift and informative. When we got to our room at around 2 pm after over half a day of travelling we needed to have a rest before going out to eat etc. but found there was a constant noise from the lifts nearby so I called down to reception to ask if we could swap rooms. The lady I spoke with immediately agreed to move us to a room down the hall and sent someone up to swap the room cards. I am a very light sleeper so do not think most would have a problem with this noise. The room itself was very spacious a beautiful king size bed large flat screen tv mini bar hairdryer ironing board and iron and magazines with info on Warsaw. The room also had coffee and tea making facilities with to go cups provided as well as mugs. The bathroom was a good size with shower over the bath which held its temp and was powerful enough. We had breakfast included which was served in the olive restaurant. Cold meats and cheeses lots of different breads and pastries hot items like potato pancakes polish sausages waffles that you could make yourself and juices were available along with various fish and noodle options. We had a few meals in the Someplace else sports bar where the food quality was very high and really inexpensive. We had cocktails and tried some salad and meat dishes all of which were huge portions and well cooked. Service was excellent. Right in the centre good access to supermarkets shopping mall the central train station and an easy 25 minute walk to the old town. Check out was swift and easy and we would stay again if in the area love a Sheraton.

Enjoyable. Would go again. Excelent breakfast Location was very convenient as it is not too far from the center Most of the staff were incredibly friendly The room was very clean and room service house cleaning were also friendly and eficientA fire alarm went off in the building at 130 am on our first night I am not joking. We were unable to go back to sleep afterwards. One receptionist who made us feel like we ruined her afternoon when we asked about the checkout procesWifi was quite slow and would sometimes log us out after 5 minutes and would take some time to let us back in.

Have it for years but not anymore very arogrant staff change to Europejski sorry that is possible not to mark a zero. Abominable staff arrogant and hostile attitude towards their customers and bought their services for considerable amountsWe have been using this hotel for 28 years with various hotel managers without any problem but with the new managements arrogance we make the decision to switch over to Europejski.

I will take room next time in Sheraton I visit Warsaw but I will not let Manager to speak like that. I did not have breakfast as is horendal expensive. I had not nice surprise as I arrived room was with two single beds not one as I ask for but reception very quickly exchange for the ride one with upgrading room of higher standard and one of Manager lady when I been asking for directions I has been send rudely to reception for the answer reception was busy with group of people and I did not espect especially from Management of Sheraton answer like that I am not working ad the reception she said. Overall very good just this two acidentsse above.

Great Location. This is my favorite hotel in Warsaw. I have stayed at Hilton properties and Mariot before. Rooms are nice and kept up to date. Location is perfect with walking distance to shopping train station and Old Town with plenty of restaurants close by. The only negative for me was lack of weekend laundry service. However hotel really came through and they did my laundry in 3 hrs Monday morning returning it at 9 am as promised at no extra charge.
Excellent. Central location. Rude bar staff in the bar area downstairs.
Wonderful. Guest service took a little long.

Disappointing. Me and my coworkers were there for our biz trip then we had all separated rooms then one of my coworker ’s personal belongings were stolen. We ’ve reported to the reception then there were no further assistant. Our corp card also got double charged. Still in the process to get refund I would never go back here.
